All functions

adjust_dates()
Adjust Dates in Drug Episode Data
build_off_from_on()
Build off-treatment segments following on-treatment
build_on_treatment()
Build on-treatment state transitions
build_progression_from_on()
Build progression events following on-treatment

Collapse overlapping treatment lines for each patient

Helper Functions and Main Constructor for State Episodes
death_table()
Generate a Monthly State and Death Transition Table
fix_death_before_progression()
Adjust incorrect death times
fix_line_gaps()
Adjust line end dates to remove gaps between sequential treatment segments

Generate Cutoff Values for Treatment Gaps, Progression, and Death

Structure episodes for state transitions
km_fit()
Kaplan-Meier Fit by Prior Lines

Prepare Drug Episode Data from Flatiron drug episodes data

Run pipeline with custom tumour definitions

Clean and collapse single-dose cancer treatment lines

Estimate Weibull parameters for state transitions
state_numbers_summary()
Summarize Patient Transitions Across States
write_death_table()
Write death table to Workbook This function appends new Weibull scale and shape parameter estimates to an existing Excel workbook. It modifies the workbook in memory and returns the updated workbook object (without saving yet).
write_params_helper()
Helper function to append parameters to a specific workbook sheet
write_shape_scale()
Write Weibull Shape and Scale Parameters to Workbook
write_summary()
Write sample sizes in states to Workbook This function appends new Weibull scale and shape parameter estimates to an existing Excel workbook. It modifies the workbook in memory and returns the updated workbook object (without saving yet).
